text: Nilda Elvira Vattuone (10 September 1911 â€“ 20 December 2013) or Nelly Omar, was an Argentine actress and singer. She was born in Buenos Aires. She was married to Antonio Molina from 1935. They divorced in 1943. Omar died of cardiac arrest while she was sleeping at a hospital in Buenos Aires. She was 102 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1911 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Singers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine centenarians Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Nelly Omar
